amendment.description: Amendment reduces funds for administrative expenses for the Surface Transportation Board by $1,940,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the funds for administrative expenses for the Surface Transportation Board by $1,940,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
